name: Air Filter Change
description: Typically, it should be inspected once a year or every 15,000 to 30,000 miles, but this can vary based on the car and driving environment.

name: Battery Performance Check
description: Fully charged automotive batteries should measure at 12.6 volts or above. When the engine is running, this measurement should be 13.7 to 14.7 volts.
